tweet: Lockdowns are deadlier than Covid. I wrote a respectful letter to Premier Ford, asking to end the Lockdown. Look @ the data -the virus is real but the crisis is mostly in LTC. Let's focus on LTC & hospital capacity, but ending the Lockdown is best for our health.#onpoli #cdnpoli  https://t.co/IIuvB7OXQo

Brian, the data cited is from the Ministry of Health. The risk of Covid is real, but needs re-assessment. It will decrease with LTC folks in red zones to be vaccinated next week. But it's important that we have a frank conversation about the catastrophic toll of the Lockdown.
